title: 104_s125
content: United Nations 50th Anniversary Commemorative Coin Act of 1995 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to issue five-dollar gold coins and one-dollar silver coins emblematic of the United Nations, to include the three opening words of the United Nations Charter, We the peoples. Mandates that all surcharges received from coin sales be paid to the United Nations Association of the United States of America.
